程序包 com.geometry.service

类 Task3

java.lang.Object
com.geometry.service.Task3
public class Task3 extends Object
Business logic for Task3 - Area calculation for basic shapes (Rectangle, Triangle, Parallelogram, Trapezium). This class manages random parameter generation, area calculation, answer checking, and progress tracking.

    • selectShape

      public boolean selectShape(String shapeType)
      Select a shape type and generate random parameters for it.
      参数:
      shapeType - The type of shape to select
      返回:
      true if selection and parameter generation succeed

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(double userAnswer)
      Check if the user's answer is correct (tolerance < 1).
      参数:
      userAnswer - The answer provided by the user
      返回:
      true if correct, false otherwise
